cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.message: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. You can accept all, reject them or customize your preferences.
cookies.necessaryDesc: Essential for the site to function
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how you use the site
cookies.marketingDesc: Allow us to show you relevant ads

footer.tagline: Connecting local producers with conscious consumers across Europe

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Comemos Como Pensamos, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part, you should not use our services.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: Comemos Como Pensamos is an e-commerce platform that connects local food producers with consumers across Europe. We facilitate the buying and selling of quality food products.

registration.title: Registration and Accounts
registration.content: To make purchases you must create an account by providing truthful and up-to-date information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

orders.title: Orders and Purchases
orders.content: When placing an order, you are making a purchase offer that is formalized when the producer confirms availability and order processing. Prices include VAT and are subject to availability.

payments.title: Payments
payments.content: We accept payments via credit/debit card through Stripe, bank transfer, and cash on delivery. All payments are processed securely.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: Shipping times and costs vary by producer and location. Each product indicates its estimated delivery time. We are not responsible for delays due to circumstances beyond our control.

returns.title: Returns
returns.content: You have the right to return non-perishable products within 14 days of receipt. Perishable products can only be returned if they arrive in poor condition. Contact support to manage your return.

producers.title: Producers
producers.content: Producers are responsible for the quality and food safety of their products. They must comply with all applicable regulations and keep their information up to date.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We act as intermediaries between producers and consumers. We are not responsible for product quality or indirect damages arising from the use of the platform.

changes.title: Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective upon publication on the platform.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about these terms, you can contact us at info@comemoscomopensamos.es or through our contact page.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Comemos Como Pensamos we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.content: We collect the following types of information:
dataCollected.item3: Payment data: securely processed by Stripe
dataCollected.item4: Browsing data: cookies, visited pages, preferences

usage.title: Use of Data
usage.item3: Improve our services and user experience

sharing.title: Sharing Information
sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We share data only with: producers to process orders, logistics companies for shipping, and payment processors for secure transactions.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration or destruction. We use SSL/TLS encryption for all communications.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
rights.item4: Object to the processing of your data

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data while you have an active account and for the legally required period for tax and warranty obligations.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: To exercise your rights or resolve privacy questions, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@comemoscomopensamos.es
